mapper.insert: INSERT INTO d1_payment (orderKey, sellerKey, buyerKey, itemKey, location, tradeType, purType, price, purchaseDate, confirmed) VALUES (#{orderKey}, #{sellerKey}, #{buyerKey}, #{itemKey}, #{location}, #{tradeType}, #{purType}, #{price}, #{purchaseDate}, #{confirmed})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM d1_payment WHERE buyerKey = #{userKey} ORDER BY purchaseDate DESC
